subtitleNullable: Genre-Based Movie Posters: High-Quality, Handpicked Images
descriptionNullable: This dataset is created from scrapping high-quality movie posters from IMDB. Then the images were manually selected so that the images truly represented their corresponding genres only. There are movie posters of four major movie genres: *Action, Comedy, Romance, and Horror*.  The dataset can be used to perform genre classification tasks by leveraging state-of-the-art image models and improve personalized recommendations and so on.
title: Four-Genre Movie Poster Images
subtitle: Genre-Based Movie Posters: High-Quality, Handpicked Images
description: This dataset is created from scrapping high-quality movie posters from IMDB. Then the images were manually selected so that the images truly represented their corresponding genres only. There are movie posters of four major movie genres: *Action, Comedy, Romance, and Horror*.  The dataset can be used to perform genre classification tasks by leveraging state-of-the-art image models and improve personalized recommendations and so on.
